DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare analgesic effect oral diclofenac sodium versus oral hyoscine butyl bromide versus cervical lidocaine-prilocaine cream intrauterine device insertion .
DOC.brief_title: Oral Diclofenac Sodium Versus Oral Hyoscine Butyl Bromide During Intrauterine Device Insertion
DOC.criteria: Women take analgesic anxiolytic 24 hour prior insertion Women take misoprostol prior intrauterine device insertion No contraindication history allergic reaction lidocaine Women accept participate study Any contraindication intrauterine device placement
